title: Hidden Inside The Academy - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Academy   Betrayal   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Tragic Past   Twins   Weak to Strong
author: Charita Vyela   Penpapaerandme
description:
To hide has a purpose, to show has its cost.

THE ACADEMY

I do no acquire what they required.

I think I’m lost

I don’t belong in their world

I feel empty,
Isolated,
Cold,
Lifeless,
Blank,
Black.

In this Academy, I consider myself a freak.>
